desc: This iron key feels freezing to the touch and seems to suck in all the heat around it.
You see a gem that has a deep green color, when you hold it to the light it creates intoxicating patterns on the walls.
As you gaze into its depths you become increasingly more possessive of it.
You see an opaque red gem. Despite its polished sides, the gem will not reflect light, making you increasingly infuriated every
time you look at it, like you want to crush it under your boot.
You hold a blue gem that you can see right through, tinting everything in a blue color. You can swear that things look different
through this gem, almost as if you can see a world of your desire through the gem. Shortly after looking through it, you become
disgusted with yourself, and soon after you are utterly depressed.
